name: hardening_profiles
schema: CREATE TABLE `hardening_profiles` (`category` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `details` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `difficulty` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `github` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `hardening_id` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `id` TEXT PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT ('r'||lower(hex(randomblob(7)))) NOT NULL, `name` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `organization` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `platform` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `requirements` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `short_description` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `standard` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `standard_version` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `status` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `team` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `technology` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `type` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `vendor` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `version` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL)
